import React from 'react'; const HelpSupport = () => { return (

Help & Support

If you have any questions or need assistance, please contact our support team.

  • Email: support@tastybites.com
  • Phone: +1 234 567 890
  • Live Chat: Available 9am - 9pm

FAQs

How do I place an order?

Browse the menu, add items to your cart, and proceed to checkout.

What payment methods are accepted?

We accept credit cards, debit cards, and popular digital wallets.

How can I track my order?

After placing an order, you can track its status in your account page.

); }; export default HelpSupport;
